definition: surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州
Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: In an Interior Tunnel/Wall Outside Scylla Hallway, Sucre is continuing to drill.
sentences.chinese: 在锡拉房间的墙外，苏克雷正在给墙钻孔。

sentences.english: When Lincoln and Sucre arrive at the pier, Gretchen and Self are gone.
sentences.chinese: 林肯和苏克雷赶到码头，格雷琴和赛尔夫已经离开了。

sentences.english: As Gretchen descends down the stairwell, Sucre attacks her.
sentences.chinese: 格雷琴走下楼梯，苏克雷向她袭击。

sentences.english: T-Bag is allowed to answer the phone and finds Sucre on the other end.
sentences.chinese: 西奥多被允许应答了电话，电话的另一端竟是苏克雷。
苏克雷的小女儿健康成长，苏克雷一脸的满足。
苏克雷的小女儿健康成长，苏克雷一脸的满足。

sentences.english: When Tuckhorn never shows up to work, Sucre leaves.
sentences.chinese: 塔克斯宏并没有出现在办公室，苏克雷准备离开。

sentences.english: We then see Sucre give him another $100.
sentences.chinese: 不过我们很快就看到苏克雷有塞给他100美金。

sentences.english: Self will get them Mahone, Bellick and Sucre as accomplices.
sentences.chinese: 他会找来马宏，苏克雷和巴利克来帮手。

sentences.english: Sucre slips out with Mahone, and Wyatt chases them.
sentences.chinese: 苏克雷和马宏趁乱逃出，怀亚特紧跟其后。

sentences.english: He calls Bellick and Sucre to have them meet him out back.
sentences.chinese: 他打电话叫巴利克和苏克雷在后面接应他。

sentences.english: The police are there and arrest him and Bellick.
sentences.chinese: 警察出现了，逮捕了苏克雷和巴利克。

sentences.english: In an Interior Tunnel/Wall Outside Scylla Hallway, Sucre is continuing to  drill.
sentences.chinese: 在锡拉房间的墙外，苏克雷正在给墙钻孔。

sentences.english: Back underground, Michael and Sucre hear the water stop flowing.
sentences.chinese: 在地下道，迈可和苏克雷听到了管道中水已流空。

sentences.english: Sucre seems to be hurting and Michael appears to be very  dizzy.
sentences.chinese: 苏克雷看上去伤还没好，而迈克似乎感到十分晕眩。

definition: Santo Domingo, capital of the Dominican Republic
San Salvador, capital of El Salvador
Tripoli, capital of Libya/Tripoli, city in north Lebanon
Bangui, capital of Central African Republic
